title: The Greek's Bridal Bargain (The Greek Tycoons #1)
description: She was the little rich girl, he was the poor housekeeper's son, and their innocent affair was cruelly crushed. But now Kane Kaproulias has Bryony Mercer in the palm of his hand...She's been bought with cold, hard cash... Kane will take her and his revenge on her family!Bryony's family is now penniless and she's at Kane's mercy. He's waited a long time to get Bryony right where he wants herâ€”in his bed, as his wife!
author: Melanie Milburne
